London Lab Live 2025将作为实验室专业人士的英国旗舰活动推出伦敦实验室现场定于2025年5月14日至15日，将连接实验室专家，讨论AI，可持续性和科学研究的未来的突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/london-lab-live-2025-set-set-to-to-launch-as-the-uke28099s-flagship-flagship-event-for-for-for-for-lab-professionals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/london-lab-live-2025-set-to-to-launch-as-as-the-uke-uke28099s-flagship-event-for-lab-lab-lab-professionals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6c5be56-fc5e-44Ed-9Fe6Fe6-49798E1A8E27 Tue, 15 Apr 2025 04:25:00 -0400 London Lab Live 2025 set to launch as the UK’s flagship event for lab professionals
想要降低血压吗？通过香蕉，而不是盐研究表明，饮食中钾在血压调节中起着至关重要的作用，强调需要平衡钠和钾的摄入量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/want-lower-blood-press-pass-pass-the-bananas-not-not-the-salt.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/want-lower-blood-press-press-pass-pass-the-bananas-not-the-salt.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6b12b444444-8f71-4ac5-a744-d18c51857d42 Tue, 15 Apr 2025 04:10:00 -0400 Want lower blood pressure? Pass the bananas, not the salt
MGI Tech庆祝DNBSEQ™技术的10年：以速度，规模和可访问性向前推动基因组学MGI的DNBSEQ™技术重新定义了基因组学，提供了出色的测序性能，并为多样化的科学领域提供了多词的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/mgi-tech-celebrates-10 ager-of-dnbseqe284a2-technology-dechnology-driving-driving-driving-driving-driving-genomics-genomics-ford-with-speed-speed-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-cackessibility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/mgi-tech-celebrates-10 are-of-dnbseqe284a2-technology-dechnology-driving-driving-driving-driving-driving-genomics-ford-with-speed-speed-speed-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-scale-accectibility.aspx#comment.aspx#comment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3cc3b45-5c41-43a4-90a4-90a9-9c7e478182fd Tue, 15 Apr 2025 04:01:00 -0400 MGI tech celebrates 10 years of DNBSEQ™ technology: driving genomics forward with speed, scale, and accessibility
#rarediseases-欧盟行动计划必须加强欧洲国家合作欧盟理事会总统职位的主持下，在华沙召集的一场高级会议强调了采用欧洲范围内全面的政策框架的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/rarediseases-the-eu-action-plan-must-must-must-----------欧洲 - 欧洲 - 欧邦 - 本地cooperation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250415/rarediseases-the-eu-action-action-plan-must-must-step-up-up-up-european-national-national-cooperation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=67132027-8C10-4628-85E9-27A1DAC74676 Tue, 15 Apr 2025 01:53:00 -0400 #RareDiseases - The EU Action Plan must step up European-national cooperation
数字生活方式计划将糖尿病风险降低46％，研究130k+成人揭示一项针对133,764名成年人的大型研究发现，一项自愿性数字生活方式计划使糖尿病前期的10年糖尿病风险降低了45.6％，糖尿病患者的缓解率增加了一倍，甘油三酸酯，胰岛素抵抗和炎症标志物以及HS-CRP等炎症标志物有了显着改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/digital-lifestyle-program-cuts-cuts-daibets-daibetes-risk-by-4625-in-rediabetics-in-preDiabetics-study of-130k2b-adults-adults-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/digital-lifestyle-program-cuts-cuts-cuts-diabetes-risk-by-4625-in-rediabetics-study-130k2b-adults-redults-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e5648-e42f-4909-9b85-7165a63e7462 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 22:38:00 -0400 Digital lifestyle program cuts diabetes risk by 46% in prediabetics, study of 130k+ adults reveals
锂在双相情感障碍早期转移昼夜节律，并可能为治疗反应提供线索一项随机对照试验表明，在躁郁症患者中进行的锂治疗减少了白天的活动，提高了其发作时间，并增加了昼夜节律静止活性模式的波动性。这些变化早期出现，独立于情绪，这是治疗反应的早期生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/lithium-shifts-circadian-rhythms-early-in-bipolly-in-bipolly-in-bipoll-disorder-disorder-and-may-may-may offer-clues-of-of-of-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-wreatment-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/lithium-shifts-circadian-rhythms-early-in-bipolly-in-bipoll-disorder-disorder-and-may-and-may-ferfer-clues-clues-clues-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-to-reatment-respense.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdd58EE7-0732-4B6E-AED2-9E347B3D7A0F Mon, 14 Apr 2025 22:01:00 -0400 Lithium shifts circadian rhythms early in bipolar disorder and may offer clues to treatment response
血液测试检测到帕金森的几年在使用RNA标记的症状出现之前一项新研究确定了一种基于血液的生物标志物，该生物标志物通过测量特定的核和线粒体转移RNA片段的比率来检测症状前帕金森氏病。该测试的表现优于标准临床工具，还可能反映与蛋白质合成受损相关的疾病机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/blood-test-detects-parkinsone28099s-are-before-before-before-before-symptoms-apperear-using-rna-markers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/Blood-test-detects-Parkinsone28099s-years-before-symptoms-appear-using-RNA-markers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70965cc8-380f-4A2C-884C-2A739CC1DB26 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 20:42:00 -0400 Blood test detects Parkinson’s years before symptoms appear using RNA markers
Z Gen订购的在线外卖比老年人多6倍 - 年龄如何重塑全球饮食习惯在过去一个月中，五个国家 /地区的成年人中有超过一半使用在线食品零售平台，在墨西哥和美国的使用率最高。年轻的成年人，男性，少数民族和有孩子的家庭更有可能在线订购食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/gen-z-orders-6x-more-takeout-online-than-seniorse28094how-age-reshapes-reshapes-global-food-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/gen-z-orders-6x-more-takeout-online-than-seniorse28094how-age-reshapes-reshapes-global-food-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6c0332b8-b6c8-41f0-a0d1-a0d1-9ccbb6d21ad8 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 20:14:00 -0400 Gen Z orders 6x more takeout online than seniors—how age reshapes global food habits
为什么麻疹又回到美国以及医生现在必须知道的麻疹正在使美国令人不安的卷土重来，这是由于疫苗接种率下降和疫苗不断上升的推动。小儿传染病专家提供临床指导，以帮助医疗保健提供者在当今爆发的环境中识别，管理和预防麻疹。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/why-measles-is-is-back-in-the-us-and-what-what-doctors-must-must-now-now.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/why-measles-is-is-back-in-the-us-and-what--------------------------what-doctors-must-must-know-now.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c154c36-ee41-441b-8dff-312f71b8e353 Mon, 14 Apr 2025 19:37:00 -0400 Why measles is back in the U.S. and what doctors must know now
心脏病发作后的早期组合疗法降低了复发和死亡的风险心血管疾病是迄今为止全球死亡的最常见原因，心肌梗塞是最常见的急性事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/early-combination-combination-therapy-theraphy-hert-hernt-attack-redaces-risk----------------of-of-recurrence-enderrence-and-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250414/early-combination-combination-therapy-thert-hert-hernt-attack-redces-resces-risk-risk-frecurrence-frecurrence-anderrence-and-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80993219-7787-4B9B-9391-19B23772F16D Mon, 14 Apr 2025 12:32:22 -0400 Early combination therapy after heart attack reduces risk of recurrence and death
